footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Constellations: Yae Miko

fields.name: Yakan Offering (C1)
fields.value: Each time Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin activates a Tenko Thunderbolt, Yae Miko will restore 8 Elemental Energy for herself.

fields.name: Fox's Mooncall (C2)
fields.value: Sesshou Sakura start at Level 2 when created, their max level is increased to 4, and their attack range is increased by 60%.

fields.name: The Seven Glamours (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Yakan Evocation: Sesshou Sakura by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Sakura Channeling (C4)
fields.value: When Sesshou Sakura lightning hits opponents, the Electro DMG Bonus of all nearby party members is increased by 20% for 5s.

fields.name: Mischevious Teasing (C5)
fields.value:
Increases the Great Secret Art: Tenko Kenshin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Forbidden Art: Daisesshou (C6)
fields.value: The Sesshou Sakura's attacks will ignore 60% of the opponents' DEF.
